page.title: 07SPORT IN THE DON VALLEY
page.content: There are several parks and {recreation}areas offering a variety of activities to the public. They provide areas for golf, tennis, bowls, cricket football and children's playgrounds. Some{schools}also have areas for out- door games that can be used during and after school hours. Many local teams are in amateur leagues arranged by schools or sports organisations in the city. These include soccer, netball, rounders, rugby, darts, cricket and bowls. In the area there are two parks, two snooker clubs, an athletics stadium,an indoor cricket centre, open spaces with grass and trees and judo, boxing and weight-lifting{clubs.}The {Sheffield Canal}is used by several angling clubs who keep it stocked with fish.
